keyInsights: The candidate's responses are extremely brief and lack substance.
There is a significant communication barrier.
The candidate appears unprepared to answer the questions.
The response to the first question is incomplete and incomprehensible.
It's difficult to assess the candidate's technical skills based on these responses.
improvementAreas: Provide complete and detailed answers to interview questions.
Practice articulating technical concepts clearly and concisely.
Prepare specific examples to illustrate your skills and experience.
Improve communication skills, including clarity and fluency.

strengths.title: Willingness to Engage
strengths.description: The candidate attempts to answer the questions, indicating a willingness to participate in the interview.

strengths.title: Potential (Unseen)
strengths.description: The candidate may possess relevant skills that are not apparent due to poor communication.

strengths.title: Basic Comprehension
strengths.description: The candidate seems to understand the questions, even if their responses are inadequate.

focusAreas.title: STAR Method
focusAreas.description: Learning and practicing the STAR method (Situation, Task, Action, Result) will help structure responses.
focusAreas.tip: Use the STAR method to prepare examples for common interview questions.

focusAreas.title: Technical Vocabulary
focusAreas.description: Expanding technical vocabulary and practicing explaining concepts will improve communication.
focusAreas.tip: Review common technical terms and practice explaining them to a non-technical audience.

focusAreas.title: Practice Responses
focusAreas.description: Rehearsing answers to common interview questions will build confidence and fluency.
focusAreas.tip: Record yourself answering questions and analyze your performance.

questionResponses.question: 1.  Describe a challenge you faced while maintaining the e-commerce website.
questionResponses.feedback: This response is incomprehensible and provides no information about the candidate's experience or skills. It is necessary to provide a comprehensive explanation to questions asked during the interview.

questionResponses.question: 2.  Elaborate on the generative AI model you implemented with the team.
questionResponses.feedback: There was no response recorded for this question. The candidate needs to provide a substantial answer detailing the model, their role, and the impact.

nextSteps.title: Practice Interview Scenarios
nextSteps.description: Participate in mock interviews to gain experience and receive feedback.

nextSteps.title: Develop Detailed Examples
nextSteps.description: Prepare specific examples of projects and accomplishments to illustrate your skills.

nextSteps.title: Improve Communication Skills
nextSteps.description: Focus on clarity, conciseness, and fluency in your communication.
